thread.title: Commitment of LL7K's crew amazes Kunchacko
thread.title_full: Commitment of LL7K's crew amazes Kunchacko - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Commitment of LL7K's crew amazes Kunchacko
text:
Actor Kunchacko Boban was amazed at the commitment of each and every crew member of Lord Livingstone 7000 Kandi who endured the hilly terrains and adverse weather for filming the movies.
"Some of the cast members acted as tribals with just one layer of clothing during heavy rains. But they decided to go ahead and do their roles. Even the crew stood steadfast despite the trying the weather conditions," says the actor.
The actor is also all praise for its director Anil Radhakrishnan Menon, who he describes as "frank and considers every one on the set as an equal."
